categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: A unit of clone troopers served under Jedi General Chiata in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. They were outfitted with Phase II clone trooper armor customized in light yellow markings, identical to the 13th Battalion under Jedi General Jaro Tapal. In the final days of the conflict, Chiata and her forces engaged a Separatist dreadnought, although their Venator-class Star Destroyer crashed on Zeffo. After the crash, the Clone Commander of the unit received Order 66 from Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine, culminating in a skirmish that led to the death of some clone forces and Chiata and her Padawan Marseph.

The unit was part of the Grand Army of the Republic and participated in the pan-galactic Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Separatist Alliance. The unit was under the command of Jedi General Chiata and a Clone Commander. The unit consisted of several squads of clone troopers that were headquartered aboard a Venator-class Star Destroyer. The troopers of the unit donned Phase II clone trooper armor in standard white markings, although several members contained identical markings to those of the 13th Battalion under the command of Jedi General Jaro Tapal.
After the unit's Venator-class Star Destroyer crashed on Zeffo, the local villagers collected the clone trooper helmets from the crash site and built a shrine to honor the Republic soldiers.
